com.robix.nexway
Interface Servo

public interface Servo

Interface for servos.

Method Summary
 boolean getDecelTracksAccel()
          Determines if decel/accel tracking is enabled.
 int getId()
          Returns the Servo's ID (one-based index relative to the parent Pod).
 int getMod()
          Returns the Servo's modification number.
 Pod getPod()
          Returns the Servo's parent Pod.
 int getPort()
          Returns the Servo's physical output port number on the device (one-based).

          Returns the modification number for the specified ServoProperty.
 int getPropertyValue(int prop)
          Returns the value of the specified ServoProperty.

          Determines if absi (absolute value of electrical servo current) reading is enabled.

          Determines if the specified ServoProperty is "constant" (value never changes).

getPropertyValue

public int getPropertyValue(int prop)
Returns the value of the specified ServoProperty.

Parameters:

Returns:
the property's value
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified ServoProperty is invalid

getPropertyMod

public int getPropertyMod(int prop)
Returns the modification number for the specified ServoProperty. This number is incremented every time the property changes.

This function is typically used to determine if a servo property has changed.

Parameters:
prop - the desired ServoProperty
Returns:
the property's mod
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified ServoProperty is invalid

getMod

public int getMod()
Returns the Servo's modification number. This number is incremented whenever any of the Servo's properties change. This function is typically used to determine if any of a servo's properties have changed.

Returns:
the servo mod

isConstProperty

public boolean isConstProperty(int prop)
Determines if the specified ServoProperty is "constant" (value never changes).

Properties can be declared as 'const' when creating an Usbor Configuration.

Parameters:
prop - the desired ServoProperty
Returns:
true if the servo property is constant; false otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified ServoProperty is invalid

isAbsiEnabled

public boolean isAbsiEnabled()
Determines if absi (absolute value of electrical servo current) reading is enabled.

Absi can be enabled/disabled when creating an Usbor Configuration.

Returns:
true if absi is enabled; false otherwise

getDecelTracksAccel

public boolean getDecelTracksAccel()
Determines if decel/accel tracking is enabled. When enabled, accel and decel are always equal, i.e. changes to accel automatically change decel to the same value and vice versa.

Decel/accel tracking can be enabled/disabled when creating an Usbor Configuration.

Returns:
true if decel/accel tracking is enabled; false otherwise
